description: The massive of the Great Realms library surrounds you.  The large
redwood shelves outline the whole room.  The ceiling is made from
large golden panels, small magic orbs have been placed along the
bottom of the panels for soft, easy light.  The carpet is red, and
fills the whole library.  In the center is a raised part of the floor,
which has a large stone throne.  To the south of the throne is more of
the library, and the reading area.

the rest of the tower, and to the south is the library.

description: The whole top floor of the tower stands before you.  All around you
see a large library, all the walls in the library are made out of a
deep redwood, and all are bookshelves.  The library is filled with all
kinds of weird things.  Many reading tables, a few globes, maps and
old furniture.  Candles light the room.  To the south is the throne
and reading area, all around is the massive library of the Great
Realms.

{cfarther and farther away, except there is no floor.  The shaft of
{cthe tower extends all the way into the {Clifestream{c.{x
36122.name: {*T{&h{*e {*F{&o{*u{&r{*t{&h {*F{&l{*o{&o{*r {*O{&f {*T{&h{*e {CR{Beactor{x

description: {cThe city has long dissapeared into the distance, and the {8tower
{cfills the view.  All around is endless fields of {Wsnow{c.  {BI{Cce{c sleets all
around misting the area and hiding from view anything beyond 50 feet.
To the left a towering {ystake{c {Rimpales{c the {yMi{gdg{*ar{g Z{yol{gom{c, one of the most
{Yfe{yar{Yed{c creatures in the realms.  Who could have done this?!  To the
south is the gate into yon {8tower{c.  {x
36109.name: {CT{Bhe {CI{Bc{Cy {CR{Boad{x

description: {cToo many stairs taking too long to climb.  When will the end come
as there isn't much to see here, just steel grey steps and stone and
metal walls{x.
36113.name: {*T{&h{*e {*S{&t{*e{&e{*l S{&p{*i{&r{*a{&l{*i{&n{*g S{&t{*a{&i{*r{&w{*e{&l{*l{x

description: The massive of the Great Realms library surrounds you.  The large
redwood shelves outline the whole room.  The ceiling is made from
large golden panels, small magic orbs have been placed along the
bottom of the panels for soft, easy light.  The carpet is red, and
fills the whole library.  In the center is a raised part of the floor,
which has a large stone throne.  To the south of the throne is more of
the library, and the reading area.
36165.name: {*T{&h{*e {*L{&i{*b{&r{*a{&r{*y {*O{&f {RT{rhe {GG{great {YR{yealms{x

36164.name: {*T{&h{*e {*L{&i{*b{&r{*a{&r{*y {*O{&f {RT{rhe {GG{great {YR{yealms{x

description: The labratory of the tower stands before you.  The whole floor of
the tower extends in all directions, and nothing but long tables with
scientific tools fill the room.  The outter walls have some metal
shelves and metal cabinets against them.  Large long tables are here
filled with all sorts of glass containers, tubes and vials.  Glass
tubes run out of this room into the room just south.
36192.name: {*T{&h{*e {*T{&ower {YL{ra{Rbrato{rr{Yy{x

description: {cAn {Gemerald {ggreen {ccarpet of grass spreads out here, perfectly
manicured.  In various spots of the courtyard, there are shocks of {rred
{cand {wwhite{c, which upon closer examination, turn out to be rose bushes.
A sultry breeze sweeps through gently, bringing with it the scent of
flowers, and oddly lightning.  Up ahead is an ornately carved
fountain, trickling with seven small streams of water.  {x
36172.name: {gC{Go{gur{Gt{gyar{Gd {*o{Wf {*t{Wh{*e {CR{Beactor{x

description: {cHere the {gtr{*ac{gks{c range all over in the {Wsnow{c and there is {Rblood{c on
the ground.  From the {Rs{Wi{Rg{Wn{Rs{c a major battle was fought here recently.
Immediately to the south off to the side you see a huge {ystake{c planted
in the {Wsnow{c.  Far to the south there is a great gate at the base of
the {8tower{c.  {x
36102.name: {CT{Bhe {CI{Bc{Cy {CR{Boad{x

description: The throne of Sephiroth himself stands before you.  The cold stone
throne stands on a raise platform, shaped as a circle.  The throne
stands cut from the cold rock that makes up the area around Mahn'Tor,
the craftsmenship of the throne looks nice, as fine cut patterns edge
off the throne.  The raised platform is encrusted with jewels on the
top.  Black jewels make up most of the surface, except for fine
crafted red jewels that create a pentagram.  In front of the throne to
the south is a sitting area, made up of couches and chairs.  In the
center a large table stands, with a good amount of books on it.  All
around you is the vast library.

description: {cThis room is filled with warm air and the sounds of machines.  The
walls look especially nice in the magickal and mechanistic motiff that
the stone walls contain.  There is a door to the north, and a hallway
to the east.  {x

36154.name: {*T{&h{*e {*L{&i{*b{&r{*a{&r{*y {*O{&f {RT{rhe {GG{great {YR{yealms{x

description: {cBefore you stands a mighty and virtually imopenetrable stone wall.
The wall stands 50 feet high, the product of a hundred years of hard
labour by dwarven slaves.  Majestically framing the {8tower{c, letting
visitors and dignitaries gain entrance by the gate.  Here, the sky
remains a steely grey colour, never changing no matter what time of
day it is.  The {Bi{Ccy{c haze slinks steathily around you, causing your
eyes to sting and {Bi{Cce{c slightly.  Here you can try your hand at coaxing
the iron gates pen, so you can investigate the looming {8tower{c within
the walls or you can turn back to the {Cr{Boad{c that heads northward.

description: You stand in a quiet part of the labratory.  This room isn't as
bright as the other rooms, only a soft glow from the candles in the
room.  A healer sits in the corner, working on some new spells.
Furinture is spread across the entire room.  Back east is the lab.
36187.name: Science Lounge

description: The massive of the Great Realms library surrounds you.  The large
redwood shelves outline the whole room.  The ceiling is made from
large golden panels, small magic orbs have been placed along the

the the west.  Dominating the southern skyline is a {*grey and silver{8
tower{c that {M{mpulsates{c with {-p{-o{-w{-e{-r{c.  The {Cr{Boad{c travels south from the
gates in the walls of the city, and is thickly blanketed with {Wsnow{c and{B
ice{c.  There appears to be fresh {gtr{*ac{gks{c in the {Wsnow{c and they lead
toward the {8tower{c.  {
36101.name: {CT{Bhe {CI{Bc{Cy {CR{Boad{x

description: Area Design and Inside Descriptions:  Nisstyre
Scholars, Guards, Lost Souls and Scientists:  Eros
Outside Descriptions:  Zy
If you are reading this and you have a problem with the room healing
percentages, please come talk to me before you change anything.
A large group of furniture stands before you.  A large sofa, couch
and and a chair surround a large oak table in the middle of this area.
A good amount of books are spread out on the table.  To the south a
large glass window overlooks the southern end of the tower, off into
the snowy wasteland of Mahn'Tor.  The library stands in all
directions.  A plaque has been bolted to the floor.

description:
After all the years of doing good and helping,
the gods have blessed Joram with immortality,
in return that he helps out other adventurers
that he was once in his life.
Type 'heal' to see a listing of spells.
36153.room_name: A healer stands here, healing fellow worshippers.
36153.name: a healer~
